metadata.title: CVE-2021-47612 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: nfc:fix segfault in nfc_genl_dump_devices_done When kmalloc innfc_genl_dump_devices() fails then nfc_genl_dump_devices_done() segfaultsas below KASAN: null-ptr-deref in range[0x0000000000000008-0x000000000000000f] CPU: 0 PID: 25 Comm: kworker/0:1Not tainted 5.16.0-rc4-01180-g2a987e65025e-dirty #5 Hardware name: QEMUStandard PC (i440FX + PIIX, 1996), BIOS 1.14.0-6.fc35 04/01/2014 Workqueue:events netlink_sock_destruct_work RIP: 0010:klist_iter_exit+0x26/0x80 CallTrace: <TASK> class_dev_iter_exit+0x15/0x20nfc_genl_dump_devices_done+0x3b/0x50 genl_lock_done+0x84/0xd0netlink_sock_destruct+0x8f/0x270 __sk_destruct+0x64/0x3b0sk_destruct+0xa8/0xd0 __sk_free+0x2e8/0x3d0 sk_free+0x51/0x90netlink_sock_destruct_work+0x1c/0x20 process_one_work+0x411/0x710worker_thread+0x6fd/0xa80

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47612` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-9.9.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-9.9.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.5.0-1005.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1001.6
No subscription required

linux-image-6.7.0-2001-raspi-realtime - 6.7.0-2001.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-realtime - 6.8.0-1008.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
